content:
I want to merge this branch: https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/847
"FHIR Pull Request Status Pending â€” queued"

But it has been queued for the build check since Friday night (60+ hours ago). In the past when I did it this took about an hour or so. Is there a problem with the check pipeline, or is it something on my end?
Interesting, thanks for the report. Is anyone else having an issue with pull request builds?
Ah, looks like an issue in our "build agent" machine -- will review.
OK, things should be back up (and catching up).
Thanks, it passed and it's now merged.
